snippet.title: 7 Horizons | Teaser Trailer | Steam, Xbox, Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
BOOM! Shoot your way to saving the galaxy in an epic quest beyond the 7th horizon. Exciting platform challenges with shooter elements - all with a comic book atmosphere, humor, and beautiful hand-drawn graphics!

Add to wishlist to keep updated: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1628420/7_Horizons/

Check out 7H here: https://twitter.com/7HorizonsGame and here: https://www.reddeergames.com/home/7horizons/
